metadata.description: Experiments and learning notes for new technologies and design approaches.
metadata.title: Labs — Satoshi Ogura

paragraphs.first: For technologies and architectures that cannot be adopted immediately in production, I form hypotheses, implement, and summarize validation results.
paragraphs.note: Note: The content here is for learning and validation, not finished products.
paragraphs.second: I record not only what worked but also the trial-and-error process and learnings.
